x-sap-shortText: API to access personal information for an employee.

x-servers.description: OData APIs for the SuccessFactors Data Centers

info.title: Personal Information
info.description: API to access personal information for an employee such as emergency contact information, social media accounts, email address, non-effective-dated biographical information such as date of birth, country of birth and national identification card information

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific
